item.title: Chicken and Vegetable Soup with Bone Broth
item.description: Ingredients: 4 cups chicken bone broth 2 cups cooked shredded chicken (leftover rotisserie chicken works well) 1 onion, diced 2 carrots, diced 2 celery stalks, diced 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 cup diced tomatoes (canned or fresh) 1 teaspoon dried thyme 1 teaspoon dried oregano Salt and pepper to taste 2 tablespoons olive oil Optional: chopped fresh parsley for garnish Instructions: Saut√© Vegetables: In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
